name: Protect Your Parsnip
description:
A quick game i made for a jam with some pals, defeat the bugs and protect your snip.

windows exe version down below if you'd rather.

update 1.1:

  • Fixed the ants not properly removing their hitbox on death
  • cursor should now work on firefox, can be changed in size with Q and E
  • grace period after getting hit makes more sense and is longer
  • taking damage system made more clear
  • boss stage made ever so slightly easier
  • grace period added before you can click the quit button after winning or losing

update 1.2:

  • changed the pause button to tab
  • spacebar and shift now do the two attacks
  • other mouselike inputs should also work
